results.title: Orphan Black
results.brief_description: Orphan Black follows an outsider and orphan whose life changes dramatically after witnessing the suicide of a woman who looks just like her. Sarah assumes her identity, her boyfriend and her bank account.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.

results.description: Orphan Black follows an outsider and orphan whose life changes dramatically after witnessing the suicide of a woman who looks just like her. Sarah assumes her identity, her boyfriend and her bank account.
description_for_label: Orphan Black follows an outsider and orphan whose life changes dramatically after witnessing the suicide of a woman who looks just like her. Sarah assumes her identity, her boyfriend and her bank account.

results.title: Orlando
results.creator_credit: Rio, Sigma Pictures, Jan Roelfs, Ben van Os and Dien van Straalen
results.headline_credit: France, Italy, Netherlands, Russia and United Kingdom, 1993
results.brief_description: In 1600, nobleman Orlando (Tilda Swinton) inherits his parents’ house, thanks to Queen Elizabeth I (Quentin Crisp), who commands the young man to never change.

constellations_other.name: Sandy, Swinton, Shakespeare and Derek
constellations_other.description: Tracing costume designer Sandy Powell's ongoing connections with Tilda Swinton, William Shakespeare and Derek Jarman.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Rio, Sigma Pictures, Jan Roelfs, Ben van Os and Dien van Straalen
results.headline_credit_for_label: France, Italy, Netherlands, Russia and United Kingdom, 1993
results.description: England, 1600. Queen Elizabeth I promises Orlando, a young nobleman obsessed with poetry, that she will grant him land and fortune if he agrees to satisfy a very particular request.
description_for_label: England, 1600. Queen Elizabeth I promises Orlando, a young nobleman obsessed with poetry, that she will grant him land and fortune if he agrees to satisfy a very particular request.

results.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
results.creator_credit: Troublemaker Studios, Dimension Films, Columbia Pictures, Sony Pictures, Robert Rodriguez, Elizabeth Avellan, Graciela Mazón and Carlos Gallardo
results.brief_description: Hitman “El Mariachi” becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Troublemaker Studios, Dimension Films, Columbia Pictures, Sony Pictures, Robert Rodriguez, Elizabeth Avellan, Graciela Mazón and Carlos Gallardo
results.description: Hitman “El Mariachi” becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.
description_for_label: Hitman “El Mariachi” becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

video_links.name: ONCE UPON A TIME IN MEXICO (2003) – Official Trailer

results.title: Olympia Part One: Festival of the Nations
results.brief_description: The First part of Olympia, a documentary about the 1936 Olympic games in Berlin by German Director Leni Riefenstahl. The film played in theaters in 1938 and again in 1952 after the fall of the Nazi Regime.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

results.title_for_label: Olympia Part One: Festival of the Nations
results.description: The First part of Olympia, a documentary about the 1936 Olympic games in Berlin by German Director Leni Riefenstahl. The film played in theaters in 1938 and again in 1952 after the fall of the Nazi Regime.
description_for_label: The First part of Olympia, a documentary about the 1936 Olympic games in Berlin by German Director Leni Riefenstahl. The film played in theaters in 1938 and again in 1952 after the fall of the Nazi Regime.

results.title: Nothing But the Truth
results.brief_description: A young man bets $10,000 that for 24 hour he can tell nothing but the truth.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

results.description: A young man bets $10,000 that for 24 hour he can tell nothing but the truth.
description_for_label: A young man bets $10,000 that for 24 hour he can tell nothing but the truth.

results.title: Nosferatu
results.brief_description: Vampire Count Orlok isn’t just interested in a new residence, but also the wife of his young real estate agent in F.W. Murnau’s unauthorised adaptation of Bram Stoker’s Dracula. Shot in the German Expressionist style, this groundbreaking vampire film influenced film noir and Hollywood horrors.

constellations_other.name: Spooky shadows
constellations_other.description: Hellish and hilarious vampires connect pioneering German cinema to contemporary New Zealand comedy with a quick detour into small town strangeness.

constellations_other.name: Shadowplay and spookiness
constellations_other.description: Silhouettes and shadows scare up some of the most sinister creatures in cinema and videogames.

constellations_other.name: The drama and nuance of silhouette
constellations_other.description: Ali Gumillya Baker uses silhouette to evocative effect in her work reimagining the colonial gaze. The lighting technique has long been employed by filmmakers for its ability to dramatically convey a wide variety of emotions in everything from film noir to animation and whimsy.

results.description: Vampire Count Orlok isn’t just interested in a new residence, but also the wife of his young real estate agent in F.W. Murnau’s unauthorised adaptation of Bram Stoker’s Dracula. Shot in the German Expressionist style, this groundbreaking vampire film influenced film noir and Hollywood horrors.
description_for_label: Vampire Count Orlok isn’t just interested in a new residence, but also the wife of his young real estate agent in F.W. Murnau’s unauthorised adaptation of Bram Stoker’s Dracula. Shot in the German Expressionist style, this groundbreaking vampire film influenced film noir and Hollywood horrors.

results.title: Nine to Five
results.brief_description: 9 to 5 is an office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. Features star turns by Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin and Dolly Parton.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Frank Hart is a pig. He takes advantage in the grossest manner of the women who work with him. When his three assistants manage to trap him in his own house they assume control of his department and productivity leaps, but just how long can they keep Hart tied up?
description_for_label: Frank Hart is a pig. He takes advantage in the grossest manner of the women who work with him. When his three assistants manage to trap him in his own house they assume control of his department and productivity leaps, but just how long can they keep Hart tied up?

results.title: Newsfront
results.brief_description: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.

results.description: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.
description_for_label: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.

results.title: Network
results.creator_credit: United Artists, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Sidney Lumet, Theoni V. Aldredge, Fred C. Caruso, Philip Rosenberg, Paddy Chayefsky and Howard Gottfried
results.brief_description: When veteran anchorman Howard Beale is forced to retire his 25-year post because of his age, he announces to viewers that he will kill himself during his farewell broadcast. Network executives rethink their decision when his fanatical tirade results in a spike in ratings.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.

results.title: Neighbours
results.creator_credit: FremantleMedia Australia and Reg Grundy Productions Pty. Ltd.
results.brief_description: Everybody needs good neighbours and for over 35 years the residents of Ramsay Street have shared their lives, loves and laugher with us. Featuring tragic love stories, long-lost family members and mysterious resurrections, Neighbours has been part of the family for a generation.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1980s
constellations_other.description: Australian television in the 80s really began to find its footing with mainstream hits becoming landmarks of the industry.

results.creator_credit_for_label: FremantleMedia Australia and Reg Grundy Productions Pty. Ltd.
results.description: Neighbours is an Australian television soap opera. The show’s storylines concern the domestic and professional lives of the people who live and work in Erinsborough, a fictional suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. The series primarily centres around the residents of Ramsay Street, a short cul-de-sac, and its neighbouring areas, the Lassiters complex, which includes a bar, hotel, cafe, news office and park. Neighbours began with three families created by Watson – the Ramsays, the Robinsons and the Clarkes. Watson said that he wanted to show three families who are friends living in a small street. The Robinsons and the Ramsays had a long history and were involved in an ongoing rivalry.

The Robinsons and the Ramsays had a long history and were involved in an ongoing rivalry.
